TextLibrary.Text: Travel to Vortraag Prime to register for the tournament.
You must not be hostile toward the Vortraag to enter.
Enter your first match at the Vortraag Prime arena.
Victory -- Prepare for your next battle
Enter your second match at the Vortraag Prime arena.
Victory -- Prepare for your next battle
Enter your third match at the Vortraag Prime arena.
Victory -- Prepare for your last battle
Enter your third match at the Vortraag Prime arena.
To the Victor goes the Spoils!
